home.slogan: A reliable partner for the successful growth of your business
home.aboutUsText: We are a leading company specializing in the import and distribution of a wide range of goods across Tajikistan.
home.valuesText: Commitment to quality service, strengthening client trust, and continuous development. We are proud of our reputation as a leading and reliable partner providing access to the best products for businesses and the population of Tajikistan.
home.goal1: Opening a Distribution Center in GBAO
home.goal2: Opening a Distribution Center in GBAO
home.goal3: Opening a Distribution Center in GBAO
home.companyToday: Today, Capital-T is a modern, fast-growing company with great potential and prospects.
home.yearsText: serving cities and districts across Tajikistan
home.branchesTitle: Branches with Warehouse and Sales Team
home.title: Partners and Clients
home.description: Our portfolio includes globally recognized brands whose products are successfully promoted in our market. Main categories: food products and hygiene products.
home.description_job: Sales department supervisor, Dushanbe and RRP1. About the company: We are a developing manufacturer of household and toilet soaps.
home.uploadSize: File size must not exceed 5 MB
home.p1: CAPITAL-T is one of the largest distribution companies in Tajikistan, engaged in wholesale trade of food products, perfumery, cosmetics, and hygiene products.
home.p2: Since 2000, the company has been actively developing: new partnerships are established, the number of clients is increasing, and the material and technical base is improving.
home.p3: The company is actively expanding its sales geography to cover remote regions. Wholesale and retail directions are being developed.
home.aboutText1: CAPITAL-T is one of the largest distribution companies in Tajikistan, specializing in wholesale and distribution of food products, cosmetics, and hygiene goods.
home.aboutText2: Since 2000, the company has been rapidly developing: partnerships are expanding, and the number of clients is growing.
home.aboutText3: The company is actively expanding its sales geography and developing wholesale and retail channels.
home.valuesText2: Commitment to quality service, strengthening client trust, and continuous development. We take pride in our reputation.
home.goal1_new: 1. Opening a Distribution Center in GBAO
home.companyToday_text: Today, Capital-T is a modern, fast-growing company.
home.aboutCompany1: We are a developing manufacturer of household and toilet soaps.
home.aboutCompany2: We are looking for an active and goal-oriented leader. If you have the following qualities:
qualities: Leadership skills and ability to inspire the team.
Willingness to work in a highly competitive environment.
responsibilities: Experience as a supervisor or head of sales department for at least 2 years.
Knowledge of Dushanbe and RRP market.
Ability to analyze data and develop strategies.
home.importantText: The job requires high responsibility and focus on results.
expectations: Ability to work in a competitive environment.
home.finalText: We are looking for results-oriented people.
home.zapolnite: Fill in all the necessary information and upload your resume. We will contact you shortly!
